message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a great opportunity to get your hands on something really valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $130.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. I'm willing to make a deal, but I have to stay within my budget.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer the product to you for $125. It's a great compromise that still benefits both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm thinking more along the lines of $115. I'm hoping we can meet in the middle again.

I understand your concerns, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise. I can offer the product to you for $122. It's getting close to my minimum price, but I'm willing to make a final concession to reach an agreement.

I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm thinking more along the lines of $115, just like my previous offer. I'm hoping we can meet at this price.
